name: Jupiter
description: Licensed Jupiter electricians providing premier residential and commercial services. From luxury waterfront estates to commercial support near the Jupiter Inlet, Solomon Electric is your trusted choice.

challenges.title: Waterfront Estate Distribution
challenges.description: Jupiter's premier estates on the Loxahatchee River and Inlet require high-capacity electrical systems, specialized multi-panel setups, and advanced marine-grade outdoor lighting.

challenges.title: Jupiter Farms Rural Power
challenges.description: Properties in the Farms often require specialized wiring for large acreages, outbuildings, sophisticated well-pump systems, and robust generator backup readiness.

challenges.title: Storm Surge Resilience
challenges.description: Jupiter's northern coastal location makes it a target for powerful seasonal storms. We emphasize whole-home surge protection and weather-resistant infrastructure.

faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Jupiter?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Jupiter including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Jupiter neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Jupiter?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Palm Beach County permits for electrical work in Jupiter, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Jupiter home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Jupiter homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Jupiter.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Jupiter?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Jupiter neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you offer electrical services for homes in Jupiter Farms?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are experts in the unique electrical needs of Jupiter Farms properties, including outbuilding power, large-scale site lighting, and backup generator systems.

faqs.question: Can you handle high-end electrical projects in Admiral's Cove?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in luxury estate electrical work, providing high-capacity service and sophisticated lighting design for Jupiter's premier waterfront communities.

seoContent.heading: Premier Jupiter Electricians – Uniquely Professional
seoContent.body: Jupiter is a town like no other, balancing beautiful natural waterways with a sophisticated lifestyle. From the historic lighthouse to the vibrant Abacoa community, it's a place that values quality and durability. Solomon Electric is proud to provide the licensed expertise that Jupiter's homeowners and businesses count on.

seoContent.heading: Understanding Jupiter's Electrical Needs
seoContent.body: Jupiter homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. Our electricians understand Palm Beach County building codes, climate considerations, and the specific challenges of South Florida electrical systems. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Jupiter's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Jupiter Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Jupiter. We provide transparent upfront pricing, respect your property, and stand behind our work with guarantees that have earned South Florida's trust for over 15 years.

seoContent.heading: Reliable Electrical Care for the Jupiter Community
seoContent.body: Whether you're modernizing a beach house in The Bluffs, upgrading a professional office in Abacoa Town Center, or needing storm-ready protection in Jupiter Farms, our team is ready to serve. we provide upfront pricing, clean workmanship, and a dedication to safety that has been our hallmark for 15 years.
